text: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translation.en: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember
translation.id: Dan sungguh, telah Kami buatkan dalam Alquran ini segala macam perumpamaan bagi manusia agar mereka dapat pelajaran
